reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable and flattering, noting it hugs all curves and works well with knee-high boots.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So comfortable to wear and looks so nice!
items.body: This is a fantastic long sleeve dress that is so comfortable to wear and look so nice and elegant. I wear this dress with a pair of my favorite silky and shiny nude pantyhose and a pair of high heeled ankle boots and always feel so feminine and sexy walking around in it. This dress is thick enough and long to keep you warm and toasty on a cold winter day. It feels so soft and stretches as you put it on, but it then relaxes and conforms to your body for a snug fit. I love wearing this dress on a chilly day. It's going to be one of my most worn dresses this winter. Read more
items.author: Lenny S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Satisfied
items.body: I absolutely love this dress! It dresses up so Nicely! I wore it with a pair of gator heeled booties for a winter funeral . I got many compliments . It’s comfortable and flattering hugging your curves. Read more
items.author: sheena salem

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Loose Fit, stylish
items.body: The material feel so nice. I love the slit att he end of the sleeves at the wrist. But it's a thin dress, so not for winter walks. Also it runs loose. I am 5'4" double DD, 28 in waist, 42 in hips and athletic build. And a medium was loose. I could have gotten a small. But the length is mid calf. Not what I expected but I'm going to get it taken in. Read more
items.author: Mary E. Portwood

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for any occasion!
items.body: Obsessed! Ok, I’m 5’4”, 145lbs. I’m a solid size 6 or S/M. I bought the medium and it fits beautifully though there is so much stretch I’m going to also order the small. I think both will work and I’m definitely keeping the one I got in the medium. The deep red color is so pretty. It’s perfect for work, a nice dinner or a casual day with gym shoes and a jean jacket. It’s a very light material so if you live in the Midwest like I do, you’ll need a long warm jacket with it in the winter. It’s perfect for spring and fall though. Tons of stretch, no compression. I like to wear it with shapewear. 10/10 must buy! I’ll for sure get other colors too. Read more
items.author: CiCi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars love this dress - LOOOONG sleeves!
items.body: i am 5'7", 34b, 140ish lbs, slight middle aged spare tire. i really like this dress. the material is clingy so shapewear is required for me to smooth out the tire, but i'm used to that. the clingy material also means any seams on your undergarments will show so be careful with that if it matters to you. love the dark red color and i love that the sleeves are LONG! i have long arms and most sleeves just barely reach my wrist. this dress has a split cuff on sleeve and it goes all the way to my knuckles. i love it. the neck is not too tight like some can be. on me it is a longer midi dress, i'd say mid calf, would love if it was a couple inches shorter to just below the knee. i've been pleased with all my CIDER purchases. my only complaint is size inconsistency. i first ordered in the gray Large and was going to keep it because it fit okay. i wanted the red color so i ordered it to try in a Medium. i liked the way the medium fit much better so i returned the Large gray and got a gray in the medium. the medium gray was a but too tight. now i'm debating on returning the medium gray and getting another medium gray as well as a large gray to see which one fits better. that's been frustrating, but the dress is great. Read more
items.author: k

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars The Worst
items.body: Dress material was so thin the sizing was off as well. Sadly I took the tags off before reading can not be returned without tags. So now it will be an overly expensive cleaning rag. Read more
items.author: Lori Evanko

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: Cute and comfy for the price! Not a sweater as stated but great for fall and spring. I wear a 6 and purchased a medium. The dress draped instead of "bodycon". I washed it before I wore it and it didn't need ironing. Glad I purchased. Read more
items.author: LL

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect for the holidays
items.body: fits like a glove Read more
items.author: Candice Jankowski

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Ruched Cocktail Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Ruched Cocktail Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Floral Blue, Olive Green, Black, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
